trans-unit.source: Represents a row of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that can contain controls.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma linha de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que pode conter controles.

trans-unit.source: The containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O recipiente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> class, specifying the containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> especificando o recipiente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />, including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e local do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />, inclusive seus elementos não clientes, em pixels, relativos ao controle pai.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa o tamanho e local.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> property gets only the client elements of the control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> property gets the nonclient and client elements.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> propriedade obtém somente o cliente elementos do controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> propriedade obtém os elementos de cliente e não cliente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to be dragged and dropped into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> a ser arrastado e solto no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> can be dragged and dropped into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> pode ser arrastado e solto em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is enough space in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> to receive the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se não houver espaço suficiente no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> para receber o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the controls in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os controles no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of controls.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de controles.

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaço, em pixels, que é especificado pelo padrão entre os controles.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa o espaço padrão entre controles.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento interno, em pixels, do conteúdo de um controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa o espaçamento interno do conteúdo de um controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a área de exibição do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa o tamanho e local.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> property gets the nonclient and client elements, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> property gets only the client elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> propriedade obtém os elementos não cliente e cliente, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> propriedade obtém somente o cliente elementos do controle.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância do mecanismo de layout do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> para o conteúdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaçamento entre controles.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa o espaçamento entre controles.

trans-unit.source: The original value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor original da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" />.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The control that was added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle que foi adicionado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index representing the position of the added control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero que representa a posição do controle adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The control that was removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle removido do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index representing the position of the removed control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero que representa a posição do controle removido.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the layout direction of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> relative to its containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a direção do layout do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> relativo ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> recipiente.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o preenchimento dentro do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representando as características de espaçamento interno do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
